statements: SELECT * FROM ForestMonitoring WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT id, location, deforestation_rate FROM ForestMonitoring WHERE monitoring_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT location, deforestation_rate FROM ForestMonitoring WHERE deforestation_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM ForestMonitoring WHERE deforestation_rate < 0.2 ORDER BY monitoring_date DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM ForestMonitoring WHERE monitoring_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, location, deforestation_rate, monitoring_date FROM ForestMonitoring WHERE deforestation_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY monitoring_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM ForestMonitoring WHERE location LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, location, monitoring_date FROM ForestMonitoring WHERE monitoring_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND deforestation_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM ForestMonitoring WHERE monitoring_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY deforestation_rate DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, location FROM ForestMonitoring WHERE deforestation_rate > 0.8 AND location <> 'City Center' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM forest_areas;
SELECT id, area_name, deforestation_rate FROM forest_areas WHERE deforestation_rate > 0.5;
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude FROM forest_areas ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT area_id, SUM(deforestation_amount) AS total_deforestation FROM deforestation_data GROUP BY area_id HAVING total_deforestation > 100;
SELECT * FROM forest_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT id, area_name FROM forest_areas WHERE latitude < 50;
SELECT * FROM forest_areas WHERE deforestation_rate >= 0.5 ORDER BY deforestation_rate ASC;
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude FROM forest_areas WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT fa.area_name, dd.date, dd.deforestation_amount FROM forest_areas fa JOIN deforestation_data dd ON fa.id = dd.area_id WHERE dd.deforestation_amount > 100 ORDER BY dd.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ForestRegions;
SELECT region_name, area_in_hectares FROM ForestRegions WHERE area_in_hectares > 5000;
SELECT region_name, deforestation_rate FROM ForestRegions JOIN DeforestationData ON ForestRegions.region_id = DeforestationData.region_id;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT region_name, SUM(trees_planted) AS total_trees_planted FROM ForestRegions JOIN ReforestationEfforts ON ForestRegions.region_id = ReforestationEfforts.region_id GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT * FROM ForestRegions;
SELECT region_name, area_in_hectares FROM ForestRegions ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT region_name, area_in_hectares FROM ForestRegions WHERE area_in_hectares > 5000;
SELECT data_id, timestamp, deforestation_rate FROM DeforestationData ORDER BY data_id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT region_name, trees_planted, success_rate FROM ForestRegions INNER JOIN ReforestationEfforts ON ForestRegions.region_id = ReforestationEfforts.region_id WHERE ReforestationEfforts.success_rate > 80;
SELECT * FROM Forests;
SELECT forest_name, location FROM Forests;
SELECT forest_id, deforestation_rate FROM Forests WHERE deforestation_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT forest_id, SUM(deforestation_area) AS total_deforestation FROM DeforestationData GROUP BY forest_id;
SELECT forest_name, location FROM Forests
SELECT data_id, date, deforestation_area FROM DeforestationData WHERE deforestation_area > 100
SELECT forest_name, deforestation_rate FROM Forests ORDER BY deforestation_rate DESC
SELECT forest_name, SUM(deforestation_area) AS total_deforestation_area FROM DeforestationData GROUP BY forest_name
SELECT forest_name, trend_description FROM Forests JOIN ReforestationTrends ON Forests.forest_id = ReforestationTrends.forest_id
SELECT * FROM ForestRegions;
SELECT region_name, area_covered FROM ForestRegions WHERE area_covered > 5000;
SELECT org_name, org_type FROM Organizations WHERE org_type = 'Non-profit';
SELECT year, deforestation_rate FROM DeforestationData ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherConditions WHERE season = 'Summer';
SELECT * FROM ForestRegions ORDER BY region_id DESC, region_name ASC
SELECT region_name, area_covered FROM ForestRegions WHERE area_covered > 10000
SELECT org_name, org_type FROM Organizations WHERE org_type = 'Non-Profit'
SELECT * FROM ReforestationEfforts WHERE year = 2021 AND reforestation_area > 500
SELECT region_name, year, deforestation_rate FROM ForestRegions JOIN DeforestationData ON ForestRegions.region_id = DeforestationData.region_id
